General.Name: Jilin OLED Material Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin OLED Material Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of organic electroluminescent materials and equipment for the new display industry in China. It offers electronic functional materials; hole functional materials; light-emitting functional materials; and other functional materials, as well as OLED panels. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.
General.Address: Jilin Aolaide, Hongqi Building, Changchun, China, 130000
